title: Just a reminder Darius has nudged his way back into the meta.
body: Just to give you an idea on what we're gonna complain about next week.

replies.body: when was the last time he was played in lcs?

What does LCS have to do with it? 
Stop comparing LCS with everyday league, seriously. 
It is two completely different games.

> [{quoted}](name=GayFluffyUnicorn,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3kPA5AEf,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2016-12-31T15:37:31.466+0000)
>
> What does LCS have to do with it? 
> Stop comparing LCS with everyday league, seriously. 
> It is two completely different games.

Then stop using the word meta.
That's not a correct analogy.
As many times as Yasuo I guess.
:P
:D

He doesnt need nerfs regadless. He cant get resets with all the stupidly broken shields. Not to mention he melts in seconds unless he gets to flash hit 3 people with Q. You dont know how fun it is to flash dunk someone only to get a 400hp shield from a karma and negate your reset . then die because the adc melts you in 4 hits

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3kPA5AEf,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-12-31T10:29:11.181+0000)
>
> He doesnt need nerfs regadless. He cant get resets with all the stupidly broken shields. Not to mention he melts in seconds unless he gets to flash hit 3 people with Q. You dont know how fun it is to flash dunk someone only to get a 400hp shield from a karma and negate your reset . then die because the adc melts you in 4 hits

He does. His win rate is too high. Nothing can duel him in lane.

his winrate is high only because of stupid colossus, you can cry all u want darius will not get nerfed.

he was perfectly fine before they added it
he is still perfectly fine, i don't see how colossus breaks darius

It doesn't break him, what I meant is colossus is the reason why his winrate jumped from 50% to 52%.

Darius use it very well and it made Tanks more popular that's 2 bird one stone right there.

> [{quoted}](name=Sanji fanboy,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3kPA5AEf,comment-id=0008000000020000,timestamp=2016-12-31T19:01:17.064+0000)
>
> he is still perfectly fine, i don't see how colossus breaks darius

He'll get nerfed, don't worry.
stay biased and stay bronze kid lul

> [{quoted}](name=5 Stacks GG,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3kPA5AEf,comment-id=000800000002000000010000,timestamp=2017-01-01T05:38:25.680+0000)
>
> stay biased and stay bronze kid lul

Seems you're mad due to your main's rising win rate, which means a coming well-needed nerf.
his winrate only raised cuz of colossus, riot wont nerf a champ cuz of a stupid mastery, you will have to learn how to play vs him sooner or later

> [{quoted}](name=LesVitesses,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3kPA5AEf,comment-id=0008000000020000000100000000,timestamp=2017-01-01T05:59:25.513+0000)
>
> Seems you're mad due to your main's rising win rate, which means a coming well-needed nerf.

Why would he get nerfed? Because some people just don't know what to play against him or because his annoying lol,
darius win rate jumped by 2% while xeraths jumped for 5% in last 2 months hey lets nerf xerath everyone! As for darius people just need to learn how to play against him because he ain't going nowhere,as for possible nerf I ask rioter myself on ask.com when they nerfed his Q widht, that darius 10% heal on Q was originally fine and that the current 12% botheres a lot of people so maybe revert it back to 10%? He's response was: "I think we will let darius like this for a while to see how he performs, we think we actually maybe even over nerfed him"
I don't even like taking colossus on Darius. Grasp still feels better because you can proc it more than once before your E CD comes back up, and your E is the only thing that procs colossus.

Grasp is trash. If you are going into the Resolve tree, you should be getting CoC, if you want healing you go Ferocity and get Warlords. If you want something else you go Cunning and get Thunderlords or Stormraider, which is actually kinda lolz on Darius.
His winrate is high because of other colossus users. Champions that Darius kinda rekts.
51% win rate on a champ that is meant to kill tanks in the tank meta. hmm.

Darius was never actually meant to "kill tanks", he was meant to "kill everyone."
That's why his counter-play is to never get close. which makes him weak when ranged tops are popular.
It also makes him strong in a siege comp, where he just sits on his ass and looks scary all game. XD

Nothing can duel him? Bitch please. 
Poppy, Maokai, Jayce, Kennen, Illaoi, Fiora, Riven, even yasuo. 
Lots of champs can duel him if you know how and also know his powerspikes.
Poppy? what?????? Darius beats the shit outta poppy unless he's dumb enough to sit next to walls all laning phase. It's a farm lane for her at best.
Can attest to this. I really hate fighting Darius on tanks in general because the longer the fight goes, the better it's in his favor.

Only issue I have with Darius is that he only needs to build 1 damage item to be not just a legitimate threat but way too much of a threat.  I'm fine if  a champ builds dmg and does good dmg, but Darius just does way too much dmg for only needing to buy 1 dmg item.  He deletes squishies too easily without needing to itemize for more dmg while being incredibly hard to kill with his heal and being able to build 3-4 tank items.
How about {{champion:39}} , who does it from 700 range to 0 range?
Dear lord no. Not a ridiculous ban rate again. 2015 worlds scarred Darius for life

Wait you mean the one where Balls, the player everyone was criticizing for being stuck in KR Diamond 2, got the first Penta of worlds?

To be fair, Darius made worlds fun AF to watch.
Exactly
you heard it here first folks, shadowfir knows the way
To be fair, he's always been a good top laner. I think he's always been meta (Aside from when the meta was ranged top laners like {{champion:104}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:85}}) but not FOTM

It's not a surprise that Darius is doing better ever since a certain mage item got nerfed and he can't be kited as easily as a result. 

He was always good in lane but was easily kited in team fights. It's not that easy now. It makes sense.
who cares about the meta anymore. {{champion:27}}
He always was, people just never used him when more potent toplaners came into play like shen and gnar and gp and jayce
I'd rather fight Darius than Riven. At least I can kite Darius, or force him to flash on me.

He's been meta for a while now.

He goes stormraiders + flash + ghost and basically just runs at you.  He's a better Mundo at this point.

When champions like Darius take CotC, they become monsters... Alternatively he can also take Stormraiders, Ghost + Flash and be damn near impossible to escape. I actually have more issue against speed of sound Darius than CoC Darius, mostly because I can at least just run away from him.

Darius is not yasuo. If he has speed of sound then he is lacking damage to kill you fast enough. Which means that your problem is that your playing a champion that can't kill Darius in neither duel nor kite.

TLDR: If he is too fast stop and just kill him since he should not have enough damage to out duel you.
Uh? No? Stormraiders + Ghost, he isn't paying damage for that, he is still Darius and has tons of damage once he gets on you. The Stormraiders + Ghost is just for sticking to a target.
Speed of sound is hecarim....

Or Rammus lol always fun to see Rammus moving at 800 MS 
 
also Nasus, but thats only because you are slowed by 99% and he is ghosting at you lol

Does this mean I should save my Yasuo complaints for another week and prepare some for Darius?

In all seriousness, I don't mind Darius. At least when he kills me I can generally see what I should have done to avoid that.
Does this mean I can kill the Yasuo's ill meet at top lane now?
I haven't seen a Darius this entire season.
Did he ever leave the meta?
